originalText.text: My appointment was for 12;30 I came a few minutes early. The waiting room is pleasant orderly and clean.  I did not have to wait more than five minutes to be shown into the exam room to have my vitals taken. Dr. Brett came in a few minutes later. I was out within half an hour. Everything was efficient and orderly. Thank you to Dr. Brett and her staff.

text.text: My appointment was for 12;30 I came a few minutes early. The waiting room is pleasant orderly and clean.  I did not have to wait more than five minutes to be shown into the exam room to have my vitals taken. Dr. Brett came in a few minutes later. I was out within half an hour. Everything was efficient and orderly. Thank you to Dr. Brett and her staff.

originalText.text: Dr. Brett is professional and proficient. She instills confidence that your health is being well taken care of. Her staff is warm, friendly and informative. I highly recommend Dr. Brett.

text.text: Dr. Brett is professional and proficient. She instills confidence that your health is being well taken care of. Her staff is warm, friendly and informative. I highly recommend Dr. Brett.

originalText.text: Dr. Brett is one of the finest endocrinologists in NYC.  Of the 5 doctors I have visited, the services she offers are provided in an efficient and consistent manner. Dr. Brett is knowledgeable on current methods, various conditions, and useful medications. Prescriptions are at my pharmacy before I get home. Her office personnel strive for and accomplish on time appointments while delivering professional, competent service.  The office is clean, well-lit, and comfortable.  A variety of educational materials are available in the waiting area, and unlike large medical facilities, you can reach Dr. Brett's office to schedule appointments or ask questions.  I travel 40 minutes to appointments because it is time well-spent with a capable medical provider and her staff.

originalText.text:
Very good visit with Dr Elise Brett.
Appointments are very prompt. No waiting time.
Responsible and very good staff.
Office very pleasant.
Dr Brett is definitely concerned about the patient. She listens carefully, answers patiently to all the questions. Her professional suggestions are always thorough and by following them my treatment has improved.
I highly recommend Dr Elise Brett.

originalText.text:
Thank you Dr Brett for taking the time with me today. I was ecstatic when you outfitted me with the g7 glucose patch monitor. No more squeezing blood from my finger.
I can never give you all the accolades you deserve, as you explained and showed me; how to inject the insulin and how to regulate the insulin, based on the glucose monitor results.
You restored my soul.
I am grateful.
Donna T
